description:
http://anidb.net/ch116179 [Momo] tells http://anidb.net/ch115508 [Hiori] and http://anidb.net/ch115509 [Ruka] more about Reflectors and Fragments. Hiori is instantly interested in learning more while Ruka is very hesitant. Meanwhile, even though they were able to save http://anidb.net/ch116180 [Miyako] the day before, trouble befalls her again.
Source: Funimation
